LanguageData.NAT_InducerTriggeredPlayer_Desc: Obelisk pulse affects all humans in the region, twisting their minds.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerTriggered_Desc: While interacting with the obelisk, {PAWN_nameDef} felt psy-weaves induces from it. This waves can twist minds of humans in the region.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerObeliskLetter: The obelisk is activating! It swells with grisly energy as the air crackles around it. It is about to self-destruct in a great explosion, but before it does, it will create pulses, inducing pain and turning everything around into it clotted variants.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Animals: Obelisk psy-pulse made local animals mad. These animals will hunt your colonists even behind closed doors.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Subdue: Obelisk psy-pulse subdued {PAWN_nameDef} mind. This state will run out in a few hours.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Suppression: Obelisk psy-pulse indeced anger and anxiety on {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.NAT_ObeliskCausedBreak: This happened because of crannied obelisk psy-pulse.
LanguageData.NAT_LetterPawnStealed: {PAWN_nameDef} was stealed by collector. Now {PAWN_pronoun} is in his lair somewhere nearby.\n\nFind and kill collector to save {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.NAT_LetterGoldenCubeStealed: You've found out that golden cube, beautiful Cube, was stealed.\n\nMaybe cube was stealed by collector, creature that steals everything valuable.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_NoGroups: A group of rusts walked in the region nearby.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Groups: {0} groups of rusts walked in the region nearby.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Stage: They will prepare before attack for some time.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Mass: They are led by rusted mass.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_VoidDefence_Desc: A group of rusts arrived to defend void structure!\nThey will attack anyone who would enter area nera the structure.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmySiege_Desc: A group of rusts dropped from the orbit nearby. They will protect area nearby their current location.
LanguageData.NAT_VoidSiege: It seems that they are here to defend void structure.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedShieldTip: Rusted armor protects from any damage but can be destroyed.
LanguageData.NAT_RustResurrected_Desc: {0} reached amount of bioferrite, that's enough for resurrection of {0}.
LanguageData.NAT_DestroyCoreConfirmation:
Destroying the core would kill {0} forever.

{0} is colony {1}.

Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.NAT_RustedSphereDeactivateMissingShards: To deactivate rusted mass you need {0} shards!
LanguageData.NAT_RustedMassArrival_Desc: Nearby crashed strange rusted piece of bioferrite, filling with dangerous energy.\n\nSend someone to capture and study it
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_AllowRaid_Desc: Allow extra features in void awakening game ending.
